divs: Sighting Detailsso i was driving my car coming from grocery store when i spotted a bright glowing object to the southwest which i thought was a helicopter at first but realized it wasnt because 400 yards behind it came another orb same color bright orange im guessing they were 200 feet off the ground about 5 feet in diameter. i kept driving when i realized there was a third and by that time i was starting to drive underneath their path the third was the last one and i slowed down and stuck my head out the window and when i did the last orb which was the only one i could still see kind of spun if that makes any since as it kept going on a northern path there was no noise this happened in columbia mo and i couldnt be the only one who saw these things i came home and told my wife about it and ive never been on this website before but you should post something if im not the only one who saw it
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around April 14th 2013
